text: It's the time guys!
author: ThrashansEXE

text:
Blue Stinger has some of the most original setting for a game, a small island with a huge futuristic scientific complex all with residential area and happy go lucky Christmas music while you mow down hordes of monsters in the market area.

I remember liking this theme so much as a kid when my father was playing it, though he wouldn't let me play horror games.
author: Quadraxis

text: Yep It's that time of the year fellows....Time to put on this song and enjoy christmas...
author: Chris White

text: Feels like a busy time in a shopping mall trying to snatch the latest deals! Love it!
author: Azure Alufei

text:
Merry Christmas and happy holidays! Let's join in the Happy Market Christmas Stamp Rally now! Walk all over the store! PenPen Tina! PenPen Sparky! Tako Pen Sneak! Toto Pen Buck! Collect all four stamps! If you collect all four stamps, you can purchase great items with a special discount on the second floor! Yay!!!

after completion
Congratulations! You have completed the stamp rally! Reach the elevator on the second floor! Let's join in this special discount!

text: Controls were clunky, game was a ripoff, but godamn I LOVED Blue Stinger.  This song will forever be burned into my memory.  I spent so much time in that damned shopping mall, grinding mobs to get enough money to buy GUNS and AMMO from vending machines!

author: ClassicalOldies89

text: I was eleven and I remember how blaringly loud and out of place this was in this game, and how much it creeped me out. Cheery ass Christmas music is a corpse littered supermall, wielding a lightsaber to clunkily lop limbs off of grotesque monstrosities.. Quirky and eerily wacky. Early dreamcast classic, at least in my eyes
